noArrayIndexKey.description:
Description

Discourage the usage of Array index in keys.
We don’t recommend using indexes for keys if the order of items may change.
This can negatively impact performance and may cause issues with component state.
Check out Robin Pokorny’s article for anin-depth explanation on the negative impacts of using an index as a key.
If you choose not to assign an explicit key to list items then React will default to using indexes as keys.
SourceReact documentation
noArrayIndexKey.option: This rule has no specific options.
